author: Andy Mil
description: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water poured from a height to create a frothy head. Serve with straws.Special ingredient #1 = Lemon sherbetBlend the following for a couple minutes and fine strain600g Caster sugar 600g Super strained lemon juice 20g Lemon zest (removed from fruit with Microplane grater) 5g Maldon sea salt Special ingredient #2 = Rose water & kiwi syrupBlend the following and bottle5g malic acid100ml Catron kiwi liqueur100ml Merlet pear liqueur100ml Money musk coconut25ml Absinthe5g Maldon sea salt100ml Orgeat syrup50ml Campari200ml Sugar syrup (1:1)
name: Eight Foot Fizz

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with soda water poured from a height to create a frothy head
Blend the following for a couple minutes and fine strain
20g Lemon zest (removed from fruit with Microplane grater)

video.description:
SHAKE first 6 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda water poured from a height to create a frothy head. Serve with straws.

Special ingredient #1 = Lemon sherbet
Blend the following for a couple minutes and fine strain
600g Caster sugar
600g Super strained lemon juice
20g Lemon zest (removed from fruit with Microplane grater)
5g Maldon sea salt

Special ingredient #2 = Rose water & kiwi syrup
Blend the following and bottle
5g malic acid
100ml Catron kiwi liqueur
100ml Merlet pear liqueur
100ml Money musk coconut
25ml Absinthe
5g Maldon sea salt
100ml Orgeat syrup
50ml Campari
200ml Sugar syrup (1:1)
video.name: HOWTO make Eight Foot Fizz
